name: Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition
description:
This script will facilitate you install of this game on Linux OS:
"Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate Edition" provided by GOG.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions on Linux platform.
notes:
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate Edition - GOG

files.gogsetup: N/A:Please select the Windows setup exe file downloaded from your GOG account.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate Edition/DAOriginsLauncher.exe

execute.description: Installing game, could take a while...

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/"; rm -f -r app/ DirectXpackage/ dotNet35/ MSVC2005* support/ tmp/ __unpacker/ userdocs/; cd "Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate Edition"; rm -f -r goggame-1949616134.* webcache.zip redist/;

content:
custom-name: Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate Edition - GOG
files:
- gogsetup: N/A:Please select the Windows setup exe file downloaded from your GOG
    account.
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate Edition/DAOriginsLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Preparing wineprefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    args: -g -d "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/" "$gogsetup"
    description: Installing game, could take a while...
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate Edition/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/game
- task:
    app: physx
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/"; rm -f -r app/ DirectXpackage/ dotNet35/
      MSVC2005* support/ tmp/ __unpacker/ userdocs/; cd "Dragon Age - Origins - Ultimate
      Edition"; rm -f -r goggame-1949616134.* webcache.zip redist/;
wine:
  Desktop: true
